actions.description: The elf makes two Morningstar attacks. It can use Rain of Radiance in place of one of these attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) piercing damage plus 17 (5d6) radiant damage.
actions.name: Morningstar

actions.description: Magical, flame-like radiance rains down on a creature that the elf can see within 60 feet of itself. The target must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (5d8) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Rain of Radiance

actions.description:
The elf casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):
2/day each: cure wounds (8th-level version), hold person

1/day each: divination, sending, word of recall
actions.name: Spellcasting

specialTraits.description: The elf has advantage on saving throws it makes to avoid or end the charmed condition on itself, and magic can't put it to sleep.
specialTraits.name: Fey Ancestry
